title: Third-Party Breach Risk Assessment
description: A third-party vendor announces they have suffered a data breach. A GRC analyst must assess the risk to their own company.

tasks.description: Review the vendor's breach notification to understand what data was compromised.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst determines that the compromised data includes credentials for their company's employees.

tasks.description: Assess the risk that the compromised credentials could be used to access the company's internal systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a high risk of credential stuffing attacks.

tasks.description: Initiate a company-wide mandatory password reset to mitigate the risk from the compromised credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst takes a decisive, proactive step to protect the organization.
